entries.name: NOMOS Archives
entries.description: A platform for archiving and exploring historical content. Built to preserve and make accessible important historical documents and media through a modern, searchable interface.

entries.name: Watchmaking Tools
entries.description: Helping young watchmakers get started without expensive equipment. Sharing 3D-printable tools, fixtures, and cheap workarounds for problems that would otherwise require costly specialized machines.

entries.name: Fix The Watch
entries.description: A service order management platform for watchmakers. Streamlines customer repair workflows and service order tracking, helping watchmakers focus on their craft rather than administrative tasks.
